question:
16 ounces of birdseed mix contains 10% sesame seed by weight. How much sesame seed must be added to produce a mix that is 20% sesame seed by weight?
(A) 1 ounce
(B) 1.6 ounces
(C) 2 ounces
(D) 2.4 ounces
(E) 4 ounces
